protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for cysteinyl leukotrienes. The response is mediated via a G-protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol- calcium second messenger system. Stimulation by BAY u9773, a partial agonist, induces specific contractions of pulmonary veins and might also have an indirect role in the relaxation of the pulmonary vascular endothelium. The rank order of affinities for the leukotrienes is LTC4 = LTD4 >> LTE4

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
